Text.Page:
The lower levels of the academy house the Malefic Laboratories and the Witch-Queen Catacombs.

I used my magic to scry down there and saw it crawling with demons. That is where we need your strength.

Head into the lower levels and find {@LinkCreature:222#1023#Chalyn}. She'll know what to do next.

How goes the battle for the upper levels? Better than down here, I hope.

We're up to our pointy hats in demons, . Our problems seem a little subtle for their ilk, but demons are popular hirelings for those seeking the quick path to power. Whatever their plot, let's put a stop to it.
